import { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Marketplace = () => { const [selectedProduct, setSelectedProduct] = useState(null); const [message, setMessage] = useState(''); const products = [ { id: 1, name: 'Maize', description: '90kg bag', price: 'Ksh 3,500', seller: 'John Doe(Nakuru)', rating: '4.5/5', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551754655-cd27e38d2076?w=200&h=200&fit=crop', sellerName: 'Margaret Wanjiru', phone: '+254735XXXXXX', deliveryOptions: 'Pickup or Courier', paymentMethods: 'M-pesa,Cash on Delivery' }, { id: 2, name: 'Tomatoes', price: 'Ksh 150', seller: 'Jane Smith', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1592924357228-91a4daadcfea?w=200&h=200&fit=crop', sellerName: 'Margaret Wanjiru', phone: '+254735XXXXXX', deliveryOptions: 'Pickup or Courier', paymentMethods: 'M-pesa,Cash on Delivery' }, { id: 3, name: 'Dairy Cow', price: 'Ksh 26,000', seller: 'Mike Johnson', image: 'üêÑ', sellerName: 'Margaret Wanjiru', phone: '+254735XXXXXX', deliveryOptions: 'Pickup or Courier', paymentMethods: 'M-pesa,Cash on Delivery' }, { id: 4, name: 'Goat', price: 'Ksh 3,000', seller: 'Sarah Wilson', image: 'üêê', sellerName: 'Margaret Wanjiru', phone: '+254735XXXXXX', deliveryOptions: 'Pickup or Courier', paymentMethods: 'M-pesa,Cash on Delivery' } ]; const handleContactSeller = (product) => { setSelectedProduct(product); setMessage(`Hello John, I'd like to buy 3 bags of ${product.name}. Are they available?`); }; const handleSendMessage = () => { alert('Message sent successfully!'); setSelectedProduct(null); setMessage(''); }; return (
